title: The China Hustle (2018) Streaming: Watch & Stream Online via Amazon Prime Video & Hulu
text:
If you love watching hard-hitting true crime documentaries,
The China Hustle (2018) is perfect for you, and we’ve all the necessary online streaming details. Produced by Magnolia Pictures, it is a disquieting Wall Street tale that exposes the dark underbelly of Chinese companies, the American stock market, and the insatiable greed driving the colossal heist that has remained largely unnoticed. The critically acclaimed documentary has been hailed as one of the most important films of 2018.
Here’s how you can watch and stream The China Hustle (2018) via streaming services such as Amazon Prime Video & Hulu.
Is The China Hustle (2018) available to watch via streaming?
Yes, The China Hustle (2018) is available to watch via streaming on Amazon Prime Video & Hulu.
The documentary begins by depicting the aftermath of the 2007–2008 financial crisis when US investment firms were aspiring to enhance client investment returns and generate profits by exploiting the allure of the “China growth story.” They achieved this by orchestrating reverse mergers between inconspicuous Chinese companies and defunct American entities, enabling rapid listings on the NYSE. The firms collaborated with their B-level counterparts to organize “investment conferences” and arranged for paid appearances by figures like Bill Clinton and Henry Kissinger to orchestrate hype and lend an illusion of credibility and trustworthiness.
Directed by Jed Rothstein, it features investment bankers, whistleblowers like Dan David, journalists from the Wall Street Journal and New York Times, Mitchell Nussbaum, the lawyer from Loeb & Loeb who represented the Chinese firms, retired U.S. Army General Wesley Clark, who was chairman of Rodman & Renshaw, and Paul Gillis, a professor at Peking University.
